definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
hemolysis (breakdown of red blood cells leading to anemia)

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就难溶药物与中草药微细化技术作出探索性研究。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare apigenin (AP) solid dispersion and measure its dissolution in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备芹菜素固体分散体，并检测其体外溶出度。

sentences.english: The fusion of Materials and Eyes reveals the truth of colors.
sentences.chinese: 真实的颜色是视觉与物质的溶和。

sentences.english: The dissolution tests were carried out with basket-stirring method, and the accumulative release percentage was calculated.
sentences.chinese: 采用转篮法测定溶出度，并计算累积溶出百分率。

sentences.english: Coating formula of Nimesulide sustained release pellet capsules and the dissolution in vitro were tested using orthogonal design methods.
sentences.chinese: 制备尼美舒利缓释微丸胶囊及测定体外溶出度。

sentences.english: Objective A method has been developed for the determination of the dissolution of hemin capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氯高铁血红素溶出度测定方法。

sentences.english: The pellet preparation can be prepared into a slow-release or enteric-coated preparation as required.
sentences.chinese: 上述微丸制剂可以按照要求制备成缓释或肠溶制剂。

sentences.english: The results show that Cu solubilizes in W and the substitutional solid solution is formed.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现，铜固溶在钨中，并形成了置换固溶体。

sentences.english: Results Indicated there was a significant difference in dissolution rate.
sentences.chinese: 结果不同厂家生产的产品溶出度有很大的差异。

sentences.english: Glutelins and prolamins are the major storage proteins in rice seed.
sentences.chinese: 谷蛋白与醇溶蛋白是水稻种子储藏蛋白质的主要成分。

sentences.english: For solutions of gases in liquids, percent weight in volume.
sentences.chinese: 对于溶有气体的溶液，质量在体积中的百分比。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION:This method can be applied for the dissolution assay of Staierkang capsules.
sentences.chinese: 结论本方法可用于斯泰尔康胶囊溶出度的测定。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the improvement in the dissolution properties of glibenclamide by micronization and complexation with β-cyclodextrin.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察微粉化及包合技术对格列本脲溶出度的影响。

sentences.english: Said preparation comprises bacteria - killing effective quantity of lysostaphin and lysozyme .
sentences.chinese: 该制剂包括杀菌有效量的溶葡萄球菌酶和溶菌酶。

sentences.english: Nestle instant milk powder, a new formulation, will be sold in Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 新配方雀巢即溶奶粉在港上市。

sentences.english: I just think it's much better than instant coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我只是认为那比即溶咖啡来得好。

definition: dissociation/to break up a chemical compound into its elements
